author: coffeebank
install_msg: Thanks for installing, I hope you enjoy :) To stay up to date with breaking changes, you might want to join my Support Discord. To find documentation, Discord, and more, drop by my site at https://coffeebank.github.io/coffee-cogs/clara/
name: Clara
short: See info about the servers your bot is in.
description: See basic server info. Show bot info about the Discord servers your bot is in, including approximate total user count/member count and server count. Guild info, such as guild ID and guild names are also shown.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
